create_table_info.fields: patient_order_id bigint(50) NOT NULL , patient_order_uuid varchar(255) ,payment_gateway_order_id varchar(255) ,patient_event_details_id bigint(50) NOT NULL,bill_item_cd varchar(45) NOT NULL,bill_amt double ,convenience_amt double,bill_item_qty int(11),total_amt double,bill_item_nm varchar(400) NOT NULL,package_flg tinyint(1) NOT NULL ,app_bill_flg tinyint(1) NOT NULL ,razorpay_tranfer_flg tinyint(1) NOT NULL ,app_patient_id bigint(50) NOT NULL,payment_status_master_id int(11) NOT NULL,active_flg tinyint(1) NOT NULL ,created_by varchar(45) ,modified_by varchar(45) ,created_ts datetime ,modified_ts datetime

payment_status_master_id int(11) NOT NULL ,payment_status_cd varchar(45) NOT NULL,payment_status_nm varchar(400) NOT NULL,active_flg tinyint(1) NOT NULL ,created_by varchar(45) ,modified_by varchar(45) ,created_ts datetime ,modified_ts datetime

app_patient_id bigint(50) NOT NULL , oauth_user_id bigint(50) ,patient_unique_id varchar(100) , patient_unique_id_type varchar(20) ,patient_nm varchar(120) NOT NULL,patient_first_nm varchar(120) NOT NULL,patient_middle_nm varchar(120) ,patient_last_nm varchar(120) NOT NULL,birth_dt datetime NOT NULL,hospital_cd varchar(45) NOT NULL,hospital_patient_cd varchar(200),rate_category_nm varchar(45) ,patient_img_url varchar(200),gender varchar(12) NOT NULL,patient_mother_nm varchar(100) NOT NULL ,blood_group_display_nm varchar(45) ,patient_contact_id int(11) NOT NULL,active_flg tinyint(1) NOT NULL ,created_by varchar(45) ,modified_by varchar(45) ,created_ts datetime ,modified_ts datetime

patient_contact_id int(11) NOT NULL ,email_id varchar(100) ,patient_addr_line1 varchar(200) ,patient_addr_line2 varchar(200) ,patient_addr_city_nm varchar(100) ,patient_addr_state_nm varchar(100) ,patient_addr_country_nm varchar(100) ,patient_addr_zip_code int(11),patient_mobile_phone_num varchar(45) ,patient_mobile_phone_country_cd varchar(5) ,patient_emerg_contact_name varchar(100) ,patient_emerg_contact_num varchar(45) ,active_flg tinyint(1) NOT NULL ,created_by varchar(45) ,modified_by varchar(45) ,created_ts datetime ,modified_ts datetime
